title: Baked Eggplant
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
ingredients: - 6 to 8 oil-packed anchovy fillets, torn into pieces
- ¼ cup (25 g) finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese
- 1 tablespoon dried oregano, preferably wild (see Resources, here)
- Fine sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line two large sheet pans with parchment paper.2. Cut the eggplants crosswise into slices ½ inch (1 cm) thick and arrange on the prepared pans.3. Scatter the onion, anchovies, Parmigiano, and oregano over the eggplant and drizzle with the olive oil. Season lightly with salt and pepper.4. Roast until the eggplant is golden and tender, about 40 minutes. Serve hot or warm.
